glsa.title: Rack: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A hash collision vulnerability in Rack allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Rack is a modular Ruby web server interface.

description.p: Rack does not properly randomize hash functions to protect against hash collision attacks.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted form post, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Rack users should upgrade to the latest version:
